nodes.text: Patrolia was an aquatic planet in the galaxy that was the homeworld of the Patrolian species. The Patrolian bounty hunter Robonino, who was active during the Clone Wars, hailed from Patrolia.

Patrolia was first mentioned in the Star Wars: The Essential Atlas Online Companion, a series of Star Wars Legends articles released on StarWars.com and written by Jason Fry. The world was initially mispelt as "Pitrolea", but Fry later clarified the spelling in a discussion on the Jedi Council Forums website. It was confirmed to be canon by the reference book Ultimate Star Wars, which was published in 2015.
